titleStmt.title: A proclamation touching fishing.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Westminster the sixt day of May, in the seuenth yeere of our reigne ... .
Requiring licences for foreign ships to fish in British waters. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
